products.name: Dr. Brown’s Natural Flow® Anti-Colic Options+™ Narrow Baby Bottles 8 oz/250 mL, with Level 1 Slow Flow Nipple, 4 Pack, 0m+
products.description:
ANTI-COLIC BABY BOTTLE. Anti-Colic internal vent system is clinically proven to reduce colic. Decreases spit-up, burping and gas.
CONSISTENT FLOW RATE. Vacuum-free feeding is closest to breastfeeding and Dr. Brown’s silicone nipples provide a consistent flow so babies can feed at their own pace.
PRESERVES NUTRIENTS. The anti-colic vent system is proven to help preserve bottle milk nutrients and aids in digestion for a better night’s sleep.
BREASTFEEDING BOTTLE. The breast-like nipple shape encourages a proper latch for a more natural bottle feeding experience and eases the transition from breast to bottle and back again.
BOTTLE GROWS WITH BABY. Dr. Brown’s Natural Flow Anti-Colic Options+ baby bottle works best with the internal vent system in place but can be removed as baby’s feeding develops – no need to introduce a different bottle.
SUSTAINABLE BABY BOTTLE. Dr. Brown’s Narrow bottle is designed to nourish through all of baby’s feeding stages and is recyclable.

products.name: Dr. Brown's HappyPaci 100% Silicone Pacifier 0-6m, BPA Free, Black, Cool Gray, White, 3 Pack
products.description:
SILICONE BABY PACIFIER. Soothe baby with lightweight and soft 100% silicone pacifier. BPA-free, one-piece construction designed for babies 0-6 months.
CONTOURED COMFORTABLE SHIELD. The one-piece construction of the HappyPaci features a contoured butterfly-shaped shield for comfort. The shield curves away from baby’s face, providing plenty of room for little noses and cheeks.
EASY TRANSITION TO PACIFIER. The unique 100% silicone HappyPaci design features the same shape as the Dr. Brown’s bottle nipple that’s familiar to baby.

products.name: Chicco PhysioForma® 100% Soft Silicone One Piece Pacifier for Babies 0-6m, Orthodontic Nipple, BPA-Free, 4-Count with Sterilizing Case,4 Count (Pack of 1)
products.description:
Actively supports baby’s breathing
Clinically developed, tested, and approved in partnership with an advisory panel of leading neonatologists, pediatricians, and orthodontists. BPA and Latex Free.
Extra-soft, satin-textured silicone nipple for more comfort and less slip
Ventilation holes for air circulation help prevent the gathering of saliva
Lateral curve of the nipple evenly distributes the tongue’s pressure against the palate

products.name: Cosco Rocking Bassinet with Play Yard DLX, Rainbow
products.description:
REST OR PLAY AT HOME OR AWAY With the Cosco Rocking Bassinet with Play Yard DLX, your little one will rest easy at home or anywhere you travel. When your baby is up and smiling, the bassinet easily converts to a play yard.
ROCK LITTLE ONES TO SLEEP This cozy bassinet, has a padded floor mat for extra comfort. Gently lull your baby to sleep in rocking mode. Or choose to secure in place for stationary mode before laying baby down.
EVERYDAY PLAY Your baby can explore in a safe space, while you enjoy a moment to yourself. The play yard’s see-through mesh sides offer increased air flow, and let you easily check in on your little one.
